title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       EXPLORE El Camino Real de los Tejas through:  News - Look here for press releases.   Photos & Multimedia - Public domain images, online exhibits, and a photographic journey of the trail from Mexico to Louisiana are at your fingertips.   History & Culture - Discover Tejas stories, in-depth research, a book bibliography, and a list of National Register of Historic Places.   Education - Access 7th- and 4th-grade curriculum here.   Management includes an overview of national historic trails, our mission, laws & policies, and a staff listing.
